thread.title: Red Stack Tech Nominated in Five Categories in UKOUG Partner of The Year Awards 2015
thread.title_full: Red Stack Tech Nominated in Five Categories in UKOUG Partner of The Year Awards 2015 - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Red Stack Tech Nominated in Five Categories in UKOUG Partner of The Year Awards 2015
text:
Red Stack Tech Nominated in Five Categories in UKOUG Partner of The Year Awards 2015
Oracle Platinum Partner, Red Stack Tech has been nominated for 5 awards in the UKOUG Partner of the Year Awards 2015. Vote Now!
Essex, United Kingdom, August 27, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Oracle Platinum Partner, Red Stack Tech, has announced they have been shortlisted as a finalist for five awards in the UK Oracle User Group (UKOUG) Partner of the Year Awards 2015. The nominations are in recognition of the company’s full range of skills, exceptional service delivery and innovative approach to Oracle technology solutions within the following five categories; Database Partner of the Year; Hardware and Infrastructure Partner of the Year; Engineered Systems Partner of the Year; Business Analytics Partner of the Year and Managed Services Partner of the Year.
The annual awards organised by the UKOUG and chosen by Oracle end-users, recognise the contribution and positive impact that UKOUG Partners have made while providing their services to Oracle users over the past 12 months. Voting is open from now until 21st September and the awards will be presented on 15th October at the Waldorf Hilton Hotel London.
2015 has been a pivotal year for Red Stack Tech, with the company experiencing an exciting phase of growth following a rebranding initiative that resulted in the merger of Oracle Platinum Partner, e-DBA with Business Intelligence Specialists, 3sixty-analytics and the acquisition of Polish Oracle Partner, Gridwise.
Combining e-DBA’s unique specialism in traditional database support and Oracle services, including; Engineered Systems, MySQL support, Oracle NoSQL, Cloud support, Operating System support and Middleware support, with 3sixty-analytics’ expertise in independent Business Intelligence (BI) consulting and solutions, has enabled the company to optimise their levels of service and increase their range of products and service capabilities further, while also extending their expertise in Oracle technology to an even broader customer base.
Having invested in Oracle Engineered Systems proof of concept units, Oracle Exadata Machine, Oracle Exalytics and an Oracle Database Appliance machine in 2013, the company has also maintained its strong focus on Oracle Engineered Systems, winning the coveted title of Oracle ‘Engineered Systems Partner of the Year UK’ for the second year running, in recognition of their commitment to delivering innovative specialised Oracle Engineered Systems solutions, fostering successful customer relationships and achieving measurable growth.
Alex Louth, Chief Executive Officer at Red Stack Tech, said, “As a company, we are committed to achieving a unique level of specialism across several areas of Oracle technology and continuously strive to deliver innovative solutions that address our customers real-world challenges and ensure they receive the most from their Oracle investments.”
“We are delighted that the positive impact we have made to Oracle end-users has been recognised via our nominations in these five categories. We place great value in the UKOUG Awards as they are voted for by end-users and serve as a badge of excellence within the Oracle community and eagerly await the results,” Alex added.
Vote Now: www.ukoug.org/2015-events/partner-of-the-year-awards/cast-your-vote/
